name: Cable Man
description:
"Cable Man" it is a 2days - 2D platform puzzle game.

Why 2 days? Because this game was made in the "Game Jam" of "Escuela de arte y multimedia Da Vinci" from Argentina, Buenos Aires, that took place from 4/10 19:00pm to 4/12 17:00 pm.

We will be grateful if you try it and if you want to share some critics, they will be pleasantly accepted.

We hope you enjoy it!

Created by:
Art: Maximiliano Mendieta.
Programming: Ramiro Oliva.

Hot keys to change leveles: 
"0" : "Menu" 
"1" : "Level 1"
"2" : "Level 2"
"3" : "Level 3"
"4" : "Level 4"
"5" : "Level 5"
"6" : "Level 6"
"7" : "Level 7"
"8" : "Level 8"
"9" : "Credits"
"R" : "Restart Level"
